doc:
Gordon Piper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gordon_Piper 0 Gordon Stephen Piper (3 June 1932 – 18 September 2004) was an Australian actor, theatre director and scriptwriter active in all facets of the industry including radio, stage, television (including soap opera and TV movies) and film. He remains best known as plumber Bob Hatfield in A Country Practice Gordon_Stephen_Piper ( 3_June_1932 – 18_September_2004 ) was an_Australian_actor , theatre_director_and_scriptwriter_active in all_facets of the_industry_including_radio_,_stage_,_television ( including_soap_opera_and_TV_movies ) and_film .
